The name of the replicat group created from GGSCI using GoldenGate
Name of the user who can connect to the inbound server and apply messages

Status of the inbound server:

  • DISABLED - The inbound server is not running.

  • DETACHED - The inbound server is running, but the GoldenGate client application is not attached to it.

  • ATTACHED - The inbound server is running, and the GoldenGate client application is attached to it.

  • ABORTED - The inbound server became disabled because it encountered an error.
